word:
ELLEN WHITE WAS PRESENT AND PARTICIPATED IN BOTH THE INSTITUTE AND THE NINETEEN-DAY SESSION. THE SESSION ITSELF WAS QUITE ROUTINE, BUT CONSTRUCTIVE. REPORTS WERE RECEIVED AND MEETINGS OF VARIOUS ASSOCIATIONS, SUCH AS 
                                                                           157
SABBATH SCHOOL, HEALTH AND TEMPERANCE, AND TRACT AND MISSIONARY, WERE HELD. FIELDS OF LABOR WERE ASSIGNED TO THE MINISTERS, PLANS WERE LAID FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CAUSE, OFFICERS WERE ELECTED, AND COMMITTEES APPOINTED.
